titleStmt.title: Iniunctions geuen by the Quenes Maiestie Anno Domini. 1.5.5.9. The first yere of the raigne of our soueraigne Lady Quene Elizabeth. Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Injunctions. 1570
titleStmt.author: Church of England.
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Powles Church yarde by Richard Iugge and Iohn Cawood, printers to the Quenes Maiestie],

notesStmt.note: Addressed to the Church of England.
Imprint from colophon. Imprint date suggested by STC.
This edition has the following characteristics: as STC 10102.2 but in the bottom border panel are added the initials 'R.I.'; in title 'Quenes'--Cf. STC.
Identified as STC 10097 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
